description:
## Title

Describe this dashboard. Add links to other dashboards, monitors, wikis,  and docs to help your teammates. Markdown is supported.

- [This might link to a dashboard](#)
- [This might link to a wiki](#)
title: Talent Evolution: Talent Guidance

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:trace.rack.request.errors{$env AND service:handshake AND resource_name IN (next::edu::appointmentscontroller_calendar,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_index,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_weekly_availability,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_show,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_available_time_slots,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_new,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_create,next::edu::appointmentblockscontroller_edit)} by {resource_name}.as_count()

definition.title: Highest Error Rates On Most Trafficked Endpoints

queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:trace.rack.request.duration{$env AND service:handshake AND resource_name IN (next::edu::appointmentscontroller_calendar,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_index,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_weekly_availability,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_show,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_available_time_slots,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_new,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_create,next::edu::appointmentscontroller_edit)} by {resource_name}
